p: The antioxidant activity of T. mastichina ethanolic extracts, obtained by the Soxhlet system or ultrasound method, was also evaluated through the Î²-carotene/linoleate model system, FRAP, DPPH radical scavenging, and iron and copper ion chelation. In general, good antioxidant activities were obtained; in particular, for the T. mastichina extract obtained by Soxhlet extraction, which was even comparable to the antioxidant standard red grape pomace [ 51].
